CVE.summary: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Doug Luxem Liberum Help Desk 0.97.3 and earlier allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) id and (2) uid parameter to (a) inout/status.asp, (b) inout/update.asp, and (c) forgotpass.asp.  NOTE: The provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.
